name: We want a DevOps Engineer!.txt - Linux Fundamentals -
description: This section outlines the basic Linux skills expected from a beginner or 'noob' level user. It covers fundamental tasks such as installing packages using package managers like apt or yum, creating and managing users and groups, connecting to remote systems via SSH, and controlling system services (starting, stopping, or restarting them). The content suggests that these are entry-level Linux competencies required for the DevOps Engineer role.
